meanings.definition: A medical procedure involving the insertion of a tamponade to stop bleeding.
meanings.sent1: During the surgery, the doctor used tamponades to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The nurse applied tamponades to the wound to control the bleeding.

meanings.sent5: The tamponades were like little lifesavers, preventing further blood loss.
